Hero.Title: AI Assistant for Outlook
Hero.Description: Supercharge your email workflow with AI-powered assistance. Draft emails faster, manage communications smarter, all within your Microsoft 365 environment.

Features.Title: Intelligent Email Features
Features.Description: Everything you need to communicate better and manage emails efficiently.

Chat.Title: Email Draft Assistant
Chat.Description: Generate professional email drafts with AI. Get tone suggestions, improve clarity, and craft perfect responses in seconds based on conversation context.

Templates.Title: Smart Email Templates
Templates.Description: Create and fill email templates with client data from your CRM. Automate follow-ups, proposals, and client communications with personalized AI-generated content.

Summaries.Title: Email Thread Summaries
Summaries.Description: Get instant summaries of long email chains. Extract action items, key decisions, and important dates automatically from conversations.

Actions.Title: Quick Email Actions
Actions.Description: Translate emails, adjust tone for different audiences, generate replies, or schedule follow-ups with one-click AI actions tailored to your workflow.

Privacy.Title: Email Privacy Protected
Privacy.Description: Your emails and contacts stay in your Microsoft 365 environment. AI processing respects your data sovereignty. Swiss-hosted options for maximum privacy.

Integration.Title: Native Outlook Integration
Integration.Description: Seamless authentication with Microsoft Entra ID. Works within Outlook's interface with your existing policies. No additional login or data sync required.

Customization.Title: Tailored Email Workflows
Customization.Description: Configure AI agents for different email scenarios. Create team templates, manage prompts centrally, and integrate with your CRM for automated personalization.

Compliance.Title: Enterprise Email Compliance
Compliance.Description: Built for regulated communications. Full audit trails, email logging, and admin controls. Meets Swiss and EU standards for business email management.

UseCases.Title: Perfect for Client Communications
UseCases.Description: Designed for professionals who manage high volumes of client emails in the Lake Geneva region.

Sales.Title: Sales Teams
Sales.Description: Generate personalized outreach emails, follow-up sequences, and proposal communications. Track client conversations and automate routine responses.

Support.Title: Client Support
Support.Description: Respond to client inquiries faster with AI-suggested replies. Maintain consistent tone and quality across all support communications.

Management.Title: Client Management
Management.Description: Summarize email threads for quick context. Extract action items and deadlines. Keep client communications organized and actionable.

Pricing.Title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
Pricing.Description: Choose the plan that fits your team's email volume and needs.
Pricing.Contact: Contact us for enterprise pricing and custom deployment options.

CTA.Title: Ready to Transform Your Email Workflow?
CTA.Description: Get started with a free trial or schedule a demo to see how AI can enhance your email productivity.
